# runlist 
   
`jrunlist` operates chromosome runlist files

`jrunlist`可操作染色体runlist文件


## Compile
编译

    brew install wang-q/tap/jrunlist
利用homebrew进行下载安装

## Example
例子

```bash
Usage: <main class> [options] [command] [command options]
用法：<主体> [选项] [命令] [命令选项]

    Options:
    选项：
            --help, -h
         Print this help and quit
         Default: false
    
    Commands:
    命令：
```

### 1. combine

Combine multiple sets of runlists in a yaml file.

It's expected that the YAML file is --mk.
    
Otherwise this command will make no effects.

--在一个yaml文件中，合并多个runlists的集合

``` bash
Usage: combine [options] <infile>

    Options:
            --outfile, -o
         Output filename. [stdout] for screen.
            --remove, -r
         Remove 'chr0' from chromosome names.
         Default: false
```

* Example:

      jrunlist combine t/Atha.yml -o stdout
      jrunlist combine t/brca2.yml -o stdout

* Explanation:

Atha.yml：
    
```bash
---
AT1G01010.1:
1: 3631-3913,3996-4276,4486-4605,4706-5095,5174-5326,5439-5899
AT1G01020.1:
1: 5928-6263,6437-7069,7157-7232,7384-7450,7564-7649,7762-7835,7942-7987,8236-8325,8417-8464,8571-8737
AT1G01020.2:
1: 6790-7069,7157-7450,7564-7649,7762-7835,7942-7987,8236-8325,8417-8464,8571-8737
AT2G01008.1:
2: 1025-1272,1458-1510,1873-2810,3706-5513,5782-5945
AT2G01021.1:
2: 6571-6672
```

经过combine后可以得到:

    ---
    1: "3631-3913,3996-4276,4486-4605,4706-5095,5174-5326,5439-5899,5928-6263,6437-7069,7157-7450,7564-7649,7762-7835,7942-7987,8236-8325,8417-8464,8571-8737"
    2: "1025-1272,1458-1510,1873-2810,3706-5513,5782-5945,6571-6672"

同理brca2.yml


### 2. compare
 
Compare 2 YAML files.

Only the *first* file can contain multiple sets of runlists.

--比较两个YAML文件

```bash
Usage: compare [options] <infile1> <infile2>

      Options:
            --op
         operations: intersect, union, diff or xor.
         选项：交集、并集、在A不在B、在A或在B但不同时在
         Default: intersect
            --outfile, -o
         Output filename. [stdout] for screen.
            --remove, -r
         Remove 'chr0' from chromosome names.
         Default: false
```

* Example:

      jrunlist compare --op intersect t/intergenic.yml t/repeat.yml -o stdout

* Explanation:

intergenic.yml:

```bash

### 3. cover

Output covers on chromosomes.

Like `command combine`, but <infiles> are chromosome positions.

I:1-100

I(+):90-150	 Strands will be omitted.

S288c.I(-):190-200	Species names will be omitted.

--作用类似于combine命令，但是处理的是染色体位置

```bash
Usage: cover [options] <infiles>

      Options:
            --outfile, -o
         Output filename. [stdout] for screen.
            --remove, -r
         Remove 'chr0' from chromosome names.
         Default: false
```

* Example:

jrunlist cover t/S288c.txt -o stdout

Explanation:
S288c.txt:
I:1-100
I(+):90-150
S288c.I(-):190-200
II:21294-22075
II:23537-24097
经过cover后可以得到:
---
I: "1-150,190-200"
II: "21294-22075,23537-24097"
ps: 物种名、正负链信息将被省略。
```

### 4. genome

```bash
Convert chr.size to runlists
Usage: genome [options] <infile>
Options:
--outfile, -o
Output filename. [stdout] for screen.
--remove, -r
Remove 'chr0' from chromosome names.
Default: false
Example:

jrunlist genome t/chr.sizes -o stdout

Explanation:
chr.sizes:
I	230218
II	813184
III	316620
IV	1531933
IX	439888
V	576874
VI	270161
VII	1090940
VIII	562643
X	745751
XI	666816
XII	1078177
XIII	924431
XIV	784333
XV	1091291
XVI	948066
经过genome后可以得到:
---
I: "1-230218"
II: "1-813184"
III: "1-316620"
IV: "1-1531933"
IX: "1-439888"
V: "1-576874"
VI: "1-270161"

XIV: "1-784333"
XV: "1-1091291"
XVI: "1-948066"
```

### 5. merge

```bash
Merge runlist yaml files
--将多个yaml文件整合成一个文件
Usage: merge [options] <infiles>
Options:
--outfile, -o
Output filename. [stdout] for screen.
Example:

jrunlist merge t/I.yml t/II.yml -o stdout

Explanation:
I.yml:
---
I: 13744-17133,20043-21352,27969-29557,32941-33447,45023-45898,67521-68715,69526-71785
II.yml:
---
II: 21294-22075,23537-24097,28547-29194,36489-36988,44919-45977,63330-63875,71128-71865
经过merge后可以得到：
---
I:
I: "13744-17133,20043-21352,27969-29557,32941-33447,45023-45898,67521-68715,69526-71785"
II:
II: "21294-22075,23537-24097,28547-29194,36489-36988,44919-45977,63330-63875,71128-71865"		

### 6. some

```bash
Extract some records from a runlist yaml file
--提取runlist yaml文件中的部分
Usage: some [options] <infile> <list.file>
Options:
--outfile, -o
Output filename. [stdout] for screen.
Example:

jrunlist some t/Atha.yml t/Atha.list -o stdout

Explanation:
Atha.yml:
---
AT1G01010.1:
1: 3631-3913,3996-4276,4486-4605,4706-5095,5174-5326,5439-5899
AT1G01020.1:
1: 5928-6263,6437-7069,7157-7232,7384-7450,7564-7649,7762-7835,7942-7987,8236-8325,8417-8464,8571-8737
AT1G01020.2:
1: 6790-7069,7157-7450,7564-7649,7762-7835,7942-7987,8236-8325,8417-8464,8571-8737
AT2G01008.1:
2: 1025-1272,1458-1510,1873-2810,3706-5513,5782-5945
AT2G01021.1:
2: 6571-6672
Atha.list:
AT1G01010.1
AT1G01020.1
AT2G01008.1
经过some后可以得到：
---
AT1G01010.1:
1: "3631-3913,3996-4276,4486-4605,4706-5095,5174-5326,5439-5899"
AT1G01020.1:
1: "5928-6263,6437-7069,7157-7232,7384-7450,7564-7649,7762-7835,7942-7987,8236-8325,8417-8464,8571-8737"
AT2G01008.1:
2: "1025-1272,1458-1510,1873-2810,3706-5513,5782-5945"
ps: some可以吧相应的yaml文件提取出来
```

### 7. span

```bash
Operate spans in a YAML file.
List of operations
cover:  a single span from min to max;
--简单的从小到大的跨度
holes:  all the holes in runlist;
--runlist中所有隔断的位置
trim:   remove N integers from each end of each span of runlist;
pad:    add N integers from each end of each span of runlist;
excise: remove all spans smaller than N;
--去除所有跨度小于N的部分
fill:   fill in all holes smaller than or equals to N.
--将隔断小于或等于N的进行填充
Usage: span [options] <infile>
Options:
--number, -n
Apply this number to trim, pad, excise or fill.
Default: 0
--op
operations: cover, holes, trim, pad, excise or fill.
Default: cover
--outfile, -o
Output filename. [stdout] for screen.
--remove, -r
Remove 'chr0' from chromosome names.
Default: false
Example:

jrunlist span t/brca2.yml --op cover -o stdout
jrunlist span t/brca2.yml --op fill -n 1000 -o stdout
runlist span --op holes --mk t/Atha.yml -o stdout (App::RL)
runlist span --op excise -n 100 --mk t/Atha.yml -o stdout (App::RL)
runlist span --op trim -n 50 --mk t/Atha.yml -o stdout (App::RL)  		

Explanation:
brca2.yml:
---
13: 32316461-32316527,32319077-32319325,32325076-32325184,32326101-32326150,32326242-32326282,32326499-32326613,32329443-32329492,32330919-32331030,32332272-32333387,32336265-32341196,32344558-32344653,32346827-32346896,32354861-32355288,32356428-32356609,32357742-32357929,32362523-32362693,32363179-32363533,32370402-32370557,32370956-32371100,32376670-32376791,32379317-32379515,32379750-32379913,32380007-32380145,32394689-32394933,32396898-32397044,32398162-32398770
经过span --op cover后可以得到：
---
13: "32316461-32398770"
ps: 因此这个操作可以得到的是yaml文件从从最小到最大的跨度
经过span --op fill -n 1000后可以得到：
---
13: "32316461-32316527,32319077-32319325,32325076-32326613,32329443-32329492,32330919-32331030,32332272-32333387,32336265-32341196,32344558-32344653,32346827-32346896,32354861-32355288,32356428-32356609,32357742-32357929,32362523-32363533,32370402-32371100,32376670-32376791,32379317-32380145,32394689-32394933,32396898-32397044,32398162-32398770"
ps: 我们可以发现原yaml文件中32325076-32325184,32326101-32326150,32326242-32326282,32326499-32326613被合并为32325076-32326613，因此该操作可以将隔断小于或等于1000的都进行合并。
Atha.yml：
---
AT1G01010.1:
1: 3631-3913,3996-4276,4486-4605,4706-5095,5174-5326,5439-5899
AT1G01020.1:
1: 5928-6263,6437-7069,7157-7232,7384-7450,7564-7649,7762-7835,7942-7987,8236-8325,8417-8464,8571-8737
AT1G01020.2:
1: 6790-7069,7157-7450,7564-7649,7762-7835,7942-7987,8236-8325,8417-8464,8571-8737
AT2G01008.1:
2: 1025-1272,1458-1510,1873-2810,3706-5513,5782-5945
AT2G01021.1:
2: 6571-6672
经过span --op holes --mk可以得到：
--- 
AT1G01010.1: 
1: 3914-3995,4277-4485,4606-4705,5096-5173,5327-5438
AT1G01020.1: 
1: 6264-6436,7070-7156,7233-7383,7451-7563,7650-7761,7836-7941,7988-8235,8326-8416,8465-8570
AT1G01020.2: 
1: 7070-7156,7451-7563,7650-7761,7836-7941,7988-8235,8326-8416,8465-8570
AT2G01008.1: 
2: 1273-1457,1511-1872,2811-3705,5514-5781
AT2G01021.1: 
2: "-"
ps: 我们可以发现该操作是将原yaml文件中所有的间断进行输出。
经过span --op excise -n 100 --mk可以得到：
--- 
AT1G01010.1: 
1: 3631-3913,3996-4276,4486-4605,4706-5095,5174-5326,5439-5899
AT1G01020.1: 
1: 5928-6263,6437-7069,8571-8737
AT1G01020.2: 
1: 6790-7069,7157-7450,8571-8737
AT2G01008.1: 
2: 1025-1272,1873-2810,3706-5513,5782-5945
AT2G01021.1: 
2: 6571-6672
ps: 我们可以发现该操作是将所有跨度小于100的都进行去除。
经过span --op trim -n 50 --mk可以得到：
--- 
AT1G01010.1: 
1: 3681-3863,4046-4226,4536-4555,4756-5045,5224-5276,5489-5849
AT1G01020.1: 
1: 5978-6213,6487-7019,8621-8687
AT1G01020.2: 
1: 6840-7019,7207-7400,8621-8687
AT2G01008.1: 
2: 1075-1222,1923-2760,3756-5463,5832-5895
AT2G01021.1: 
2: 6621-6622
ps:我们可以发现该操作是将所有跨度的前端增加50，后端减少50，整个跨度缩小100，如果原跨度长度小于100则会被删除。
pps：-n后面的数值还可以写负数，例如-50。runlist span --op trim -n -50 --mk t/Atha.yml -o stdout (App::RL)，其效果和runlist span --op pad -n 50 --mk t/Atha.yml -o stdout相同。
得到的结果是：
--- 
AT1G01010.1: 
1: 3581-4326,4436-5376,5389-5949
AT1G01020.1: 
1: 5878-6313,6387-7282,7334-7500,7514-7699,7712-7885,7892-8037,8186-8514,8521-8787
AT1G01020.2: 
1: 6740-7500,7514-7699,7712-7885,7892-8037,8186-8514,8521-8787
AT2G01008.1: 
2: 975-1322,1408-1560,1823-2860,3656-5563,5732-5995
AT2G01021.1: 
2: 6521-6722
ppps: 我们可以发现该操作是将所有跨度的前端减少50，后端增加50，整个跨度增大100，如果原间隔长度小于100，跨度增加后会有重叠，那么则会进行合并。
```

### 8. split

```bash
Split a runlist yaml file
Usage: split [options] <infile>
Options:
--outdir, -o
Output location. [stdout] for screen.
Default: .
--suffix, -s
Extension of output files.
Default: .yml
Example:

runlist split t/repeat.yml -o stdout (App::RL)

### 9. stat

```bash      
Coverage on chromosomes for runlists
统计runlist覆盖染色体的比例
Usage: stat [options] <chr.size> <infile>
Options:
--all
Only write whole genome stats.
Default: false
--outfile, -o
Output filename. [stdout] for screen.
--remove, -r
Remove 'chr0' from chromosome names.
Default: false
Example:

jrunlist stat t/chr.sizes t/intergenic.yml -o stdout 
jrunlist stat t/chr.sizes t/intergenic.yml -o stdout --all
jrunlist stat t/Atha.chr.sizes t/Atha.yml --all -o stdout
runlist stat t/intergenic.yml -s t/chr.sizes -o stdout (App::RL)	
runlist stat t/intergenic.yml -s t/chr.sizes --all -o stdout (App::RL)
runlist stat t/Atha.yml -s t/Atha.chr.sizes --mk --all -o stdout (App::RL)

### 10. statop

```bash
Coverage on chromosomes for one YAML crossed another
Only the *first* file can contain multiple sets of runlists.
Usage: statop [options] <chr.size> <infile1> <infile2>
Options:
--all
Only write whole genome stats.
Default: false
--base, -b
basename of infile2
--op
operations: intersect, union, diff or xor.
Default: intersect
--outfile, -o
Output filename. [stdout] for screen.
--remove, -r
Remove 'chr0' from chromosome names.
Default: false
Example:

jrunlist statop --op intersect t/chr.sizes t/intergenic.yml t/repeat.yml -o stdout 
jrunlist statop --op intersect --all t/chr.sizes t/intergenic.yml t/repeat.yml -o stdout
jrunlist statop --op intersect --all t/Atha.chr.sizes t/Atha.yml t/Atha.trf.yml -o stdout
runlist stat2 --op intersect t/intergenic.yml t/repeat.yml -s t/chr.sizes -o stdout (App::RL)	
runlist stat2 --op intersect t/intergenic.yml t/repeat.yml -s t/chr.sizes --all -o stdout (App::RL)
runlist stat2 --op intersect t/Atha.yml t/Atha.trf.yml -s t/Atha.chr.sizes --all --mk -o stdout (App::RL)

Explanation:
intergenic.yml:
---
